BadgeDetail.Name: Decision Making
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they are able to make effective decisions.They can identify and evaluate the key available options and decide on an appropriate and effective course of action.

Task.Title: Decision made
Task.Body: Describe a recent scenario within the past 3 months where you have demonstrated your decision making skills. State the issue, what options you identified, the decision you ultimately made and the resulting outcome of that decision.
Task.HtmlBody: Describe a recent scenario within the past 3 months where you have demonstrated your decision making skills. State the issue, what options you identified, the decision you ultimately made and the resulting outcome of that decision.
Task.TextileBody: Describe a recent scenario within the past 3 months where you have demonstrated your decision making skills. State the issue, what options you identified, the decision you ultimately made and the resulting outcome of that decision.
